attributes.review: It took a whole month to download and when it did my phone kept blocking out and shutting off and I deleted it than it was normal again so I downloaded it again and it happened again and half of my stuff on my phone such as pictures, games, music, videos, etc, was GONE  than when I finally deleted it it all came back so I warn you DO NOT GET THIS APP thank you for reading this
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I didnt even text the number and I started to get text and emails from the app. The app took information from my phone including contacts and photos. I am furious
attributes.title: Horrible experience

attributes.review: so i had to go walk my goldfish as one does, then trump tried to connect to me through the app saying i couldn’t walk my goldfish anymore. so then i decided to reserve tickets to his rally and bring my goldfish. but it turns out i had to walk him at that exact day and time and i couldn’t go. and many other people had this same experience. and we hurt his fragile feelings. then he decided to try to ban my favorite app. so let’s ban his. 💖💋💅🏻
attributes.title: interesting story

attributes.review: 0/10!!! after trying to download the app for DAYS i opened it and this big orange cheeto man came up! i was so scared!!! NOT THE WAY TO GREET NEW FANS! TAKE THIS APP DOWN!

attributes.review: It’s wasn’t helpful with anything and I just want this app out of here so do not download it and leave your worst rating on it!
